text: - [Skyy Voiceover] Skyy, where the girls?
They're not here, okay?

Now you wanna cry or
you wanna drink, okay?
Let's do some drinking.

This is the Reese's peanut
butter cup spiked milkshake.

So we start off by muddling
Reese's Pieces, okay?
Get them nice and crunchy.

Then we put some chocolate
fudge on our plate.
I know what it looks like, homeboy.
It's chocolate fudge, okay?
(laughs)
But I know what it looks like.

So let's rim this glass
in the chocolate fudge

and then dip it in
those crunched up pieces
of Reese's Pieces.
A lot of pieces going on there.
Now the glass is sexy.

So we grab a blender,
put in vanilla ice cream.
Come behind with a couple of
Reese's Pieces peanut butter cups.

Then we hit it with some
double chocolate vodka.
You could use chocolate vodka.
Don't have to be double chocolate

but we like to double down
here on Tipsy Bartender.
Then we hit it with some Frangelico

and some white chocolate
liquor and we blend.
Bang!
That's our mix but we're not done yet.

We have to sexify our glass
with more chocolate syrup.
Okay?
Now we pour in our mix, watch it flow.
Tell me that ain't sexy,
so I can call you a salty ass liar, okay?
Leave a negative comment down below.
Then we hit this with some whipped cream.

Put a nice Reese's
Pieces peanut butter cup
on top to sexify it
and some more chocolate syrup.
And there you have it!

The Reese's Pieces peanut
butter cup spiked milkshake!
